source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Colorants in Soapmaking
items.headline: Everything a soapmaker needs to know about color and more
objectives_summary: Learn to use dyes
Learn to use pigments
Learn to use micas

items.title: Draw Victorian Portraits with Pastel Pencils | 3 in 1 Bundle
items.headline: 3 Stunning Portraits inside 1 Course! Learn to use Pastel Pencil Techniques to create stunning Victorian Portraits.
objectives_summary: How to use Pastel Pencil Techniques to Draw 3 Different Victorian Portraits
Apply the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones
Be able to apply the techniques learnt to their own Portraits

items.title: How To Draw Dogs Vol 2 - Staffy, German Shepherd & Shih Tzu
items.headline: Learn How to Draw 3 AMAZING Dog Portraits with EASY to follow step by step videos. Draw Pictures you can be proud of
objectives_summary: How to use Pastel Pencil Techniques to Draw 3 Different Breeds of Dogs
Apply the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones
Be able to apply the techniques learnt to their own pictures

items.title: Acrylic lesson - Realistic Lily - Flower Painting

visible_instructors.name: Ekaterina
visible_instructors.title: Ekaterina Fedorova
visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor and Acrylic Artist and Art Tutor

items.headline: We learn how to paint the Realistic Lily flower step-by-step!
objectives_summary: Discover how you can paint lily flower: how to plan layers for it, what parts to paint and in what order, how to go from the general to the specific
Learn acrylic painting techniques: layering, blending, glazing, detailing, use of shaped brushes
Learn acrylic painting basics: values, color mixing, issue fixing

items.title: Learn Acrylic Painting: Design and Illustrate a Duck
items.headline: Master warm and cool contrast in acrylic painting. Color can be super easy.
objectives_summary: Understand the basics of Acrylic Painting
This course is for beginners, and not only, who want to know more about acrylic painting.
How to create a duck using acrylic paint

items.title: Figure Drawing - The Body in Action
items.headline: An in depth course on Figure Drawing from Beginner to Advanced
objectives_summary: You will learn techniques that will improve your figure drawing skills.
Learn how to use gesture to improve your figure drawings.
Learn the anatomy of the figure.

items.title: Saugeen Kayakers - Watercolour & Pen  Workshop
items.headline: Workshops are great for Novice to Intermediate Painters learning  New Watercolour Techniques
objectives_summary: Review basic watercolour techniques and create a beautiful painting of two Kayakers on the Saugeen River
'Can't draw', no problem; you will be shown how to transfer an image unto watercolour paper
Learn new techniques to protect the whites of your paper and enjoy pouring watercolours

items.title: How to Write a Short Story
items.headline: Six steps to writing your short story without getting caught up in the minutiae.
objectives_summary: How to write and FINISH a short story.

items.title: Real ink and watercolor brushes on an iPad
items.headline: using Adobe Photoshop Sketch mobile app with Photoshop brushes
objectives_summary: Use Adobe Photoshop Sketch app
Know where to buy photoshop brushes
Know where to get free brushes

items.title: The Art of Stone Carving
items.headline: Simple & step by step guide for creating amazing stone murals
objectives_summary: Master the skills of sculpting
Mark and create levels on stone
Refine and polish the mural

items.title: Rock Painting and Beyond - Decorative Stone Art
items.headline: 5 Steps to Being an Art Rock Star
objectives_summary: Create beautiful rock art with confidence

items.title: 1 Colour Watercolour - Learn to Paint this Sepia Landscape
items.headline: Learn how to paint a 1860's Sepia Landscape of Yalding in Kent, England with just 1 colour - sepia. Realistic Watercolor
objectives_summary: How to paint a sepia watercolour painting
Apply new watercolor techniques to their own work
How to achieve various tones and contrasts within one colour

items.title: Realistic Colored Pencil Drawing: Face Drawing Of Woman

visible_instructors.title: Matin Shafiei
visible_instructors.name: Matin
visible_instructors.job_title: Colored Pencil and Ballpoint Pen Drawing Artist

visible_instructors.title: Homa Tayefeh
visible_instructors.name: Homa
visible_instructors.job_title: Colored Pencil and Ballpoint Pen Drawing Artist

items.headline: Learn How to Draw Realistic Face and Finger with Colored Pencil.  Portrait Drawing with Colored Pencil  is a Cool Art
objectives_summary: Students are expected to be able to recognize color and analyze skin color from the images and also know how to mix colors
They learn how to create a volume of face and fingers and also draw clear skin
Students learn some tools like cutter in drawing the tissues of the skin.

items.title: Learn to crochet a baby blanket from start to finish
items.headline: Beginners course learn how to crochet a baby blanket
objectives_summary: How to crochet a baby blanket from start to finish without the need of any experience, even if you have never used a hook before, you will be able to advance to joining up your squares and crocheting a border for your blanket!

items.title: Learn to Paint a Classic Seascape

visible_instructors.name: Steve
visible_instructors.title: Steve Curl
visible_instructors.job_title: 2-Time Teacher Of The Year & Award-Winning Painter

items.headline: 100% Satisfaction Guarantee! Features a 2-time Teacher Of The Year and award-winning painter
objectives_summary: Think through and make compositional choices to paint a good, complete seascape.
Draw a thumbnail value sketch as part of the planning process.
Establish a game plan for navigating the different phases of a painting.

items.title: Sewing: Making Friends with Your Serger
items.headline: This extensive course will help you learn your serger inside and out in no time!
objectives_summary: This sewing course will provide instruction and tips to get your serging like a pro.
Machine overview to help you understand the various parts of a serger, including tips on what types of needles and thread to use.
Tips on what stitches to use and when it is best to use them including overlock and hemming stitches.
